attributes.action: Independently investigate and reinstate the Arbroath RNLI lifeboat Crew
attributes.background: Due to media misreporting this crew has been failed by the RNLI who have over reacted to an out of hours incident. The loss of a vital lifeboat for the town of Arbroath is significant and against the core values of the RNLI.  The community of Arbroath must have a voice in this important decision.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the RNLI, not the UK Government or Parliament.
